pyclerk.endpoints.cases module¶

class pyclerk.endpoints.cases.CasesEndpoint(access_token: str = 'abcd12345', api_version: int = 1, body_format: str = 'text')¶

Bases: pyclerk.endpoints._endpoint.Endpoint

browse_or_search_cases(parameters: dict) → tuple¶

API call to browse or search all available cases :param parameters: dict of parameters to include in the API call :return: tuple of (dict, APIResponse), or (dict, None) if no casebody data

single_case(case_id: int, full_case: bool = True) → tuple¶

API Call to return a single case. :param case_id: Caselaw Access Project ID of the desired case :param full_case: True to return the case body, False to return only metadata :return: tuple of (dict, APIResponse), or (dict, None) if no casebody data
